description: Minimum width requirement for interconnects must be at least 0.18 micrometers.
Minimum width of HVNMOS gate must be at least 0.5 micrometers.
Minimum width of HVPVMOS gate must be at least 0.42 micrometers.
Minimum spacing between two GT regions should be at least 0.212 micrometers.
Minimum spacing between two GT regions with contact on active area should be at least 0.318 micrometers.
Minimum spacing between two GT regions without contact on active area should be at least 0.25 micrometers.
Minimum extension of poly end cap must be at least 0.186 micrometers.
Minimum extension from active to GT region must be at least 0.27 micrometers.
Minimum spacing of poly to active area should be at least 0.084 micrometers.
Minimum spacing for interconnects and vias must be at least 0.25 micrometers.
Minimum spacing for poly to gate oxide must be at least 0.15 micrometers.
Minimum area requirement for poly must be at least 0.15 square micrometers.
Maximum width for metal lines should not exceed 5.0 micrometers.
Enclosure margin around vias must be at least 0.18 micrometers on all sides.
Aspect ratio for contacts should not exceed a ratio of 3:1.
